text: John David Tones (born 3 December 1950) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:People from the City of Sunderland Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:Swansea City A.F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Tones
